item.title: 11‑Year‑Old Goes Silent After a Creepy Knock at the Door
item.description: An ordinary evening turns unsettling when a strange knock leaves an 11‑year‑old suddenly silent. This breakdown looks at what happened next and why the moment raised serious concern.

media:content.media:title: 11‑Year‑Old Goes Silent After a Creepy Knock at the Door
media:content.media:description: An ordinary evening turns unsettling when a strange knock leaves an 11‑year‑old suddenly silent. This breakdown looks at what happened next and why the moment raised serious concern.

item.title: The Alicia Kozakiewicz Case Explained
item.description: Alicia Kozakiewicz was taken from her own home in a case that shocked the nation. This breakdown explains what happened, how she was found, and why her story remains so important today.
